item.title: The Devil's Hour - Season 1 (2022)
item.description: Warning!!! This contains heavy spoilers for the tv show. Actually, I would say that knowing almost anything about this is a spoiler. So if you think you might like this, give it a go and come back once you’ve watched it! ðŸ™‚ These six one-hour episodes are a wild ride that is worth experiencing. And they are worth being experienced without any prior knowledge. The main focus of this show is Lucy Chambers, a single mom with a kid that is seemingly plagued by schizophrenia and is suffering from some type of autism.
